discourse_list.title: Nice job with the trust system admins and mods

content.content: I hate to say I told you so, but yeah lol. I dont even need more than a level 2 trust level. This will make it very very hard for unscrupulous raiders and heartless manipulators to try to sway opinion on here and simply flag everything that goes against their interests, even if it doesnt involve a post violating a rule. Theres not really a point to having a forum if its 50% raid posts and manipulation. Hopefully now we can have clear and reasoned discussion on how we want to collectively govern. Cheers
content.GPT-summary: The post is providing positive feedback on a trust system implemented on a forum. The author explains how the system will prevent manipulation and allow for clear discussion. There is no collaboration, advertising, or negative feedback on the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: Please hold off of creating so many different topics. E.g. a comment like this would be more suitable in a private message to one of the moderators. Thank you for the feedback, regarding flagging / raid: we are on top of that and false reports will be punished. Spam will be removed.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
